articles.author: India Today Science Desk
articles.title: Axiom-3 mission to launch with four European astronauts to space on Wednesday - India Today
articles.description: Nasa has completed the internal Flight Readiness Review moving the crew one step closer to launch.
articles.content:
Nasa will launch four astronauts to the International Space Station on Wednesday on the Axiom-3 mission.
The crew includes Michael Lopez-Alegria of the US and Spain, Pilot Walter Villadei of the Ita… [+4339 chars]
